channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
Every time i start my server i will be able to play for a few minutes with my players, and then we all start dcing over and over....
this is what the problem is...
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/al40ae.png[/img]
I dont know what it means, so if you DO know, please reply and HELP!!!

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Alternatepkz Alternatepkz
item.description:
@Alternatepkz wrote:

8696 says ----

       public void createNewTileObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation,
		[b]int tileObjectType) {[/b]
	outStream.createFrame(85);
	outStream.writeByteC(y - (mapRegionY * 8));
	outStream.writeByteC(x - (mapRegionX * 8));

Note - The bolded line is line 8696

So,seeing this code, can someone tell me what it needs to become so i dont keep dcing?

HELP IF YOU CAN…

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

On line 8696 of your client class is something that is null, probably an uninitialized variable or some shit that you are trying to use.

Read full topic
